title: Opinion: Has the Trudeau government been as derelict on India’s interference as it has been on China’s?
comments: CCP has massive influence over Canadian politicians. CCP funds many of Trudeau’s liberal party candidates. Trudeau can’t dare to take on China. He has delayed Chinese election interference inquiry for months.
